title: Electronic Music Pro Bundle: 400 Tracks
longDescription:
LISTEN TO SAMPLERS HERE


DETAILS:

  • LISTEN ALL THE CONTENTS OF SPECIFIC STYLES BY CLICKING HERE
  • 400 Original Tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty Free License (no copyright issues, use freely!)
  • Music Genres in this bundle include: 

Techno, Trance, Electronic-Cinematic, J-Pop, Synthwave and 80's, Lo-Fi, Trap, House, Drum and Bass, EDM and Quirky Electronic

  • Ideal for most game genres including:

Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Futuristic, Cyberpunk, Rogue-Like, Metroidvania, Space-Shooter, First-Person Shooters, Sports, Platformer, Run and Jump (and other mobile game styles), Puzzle, Futuristic or Modern RPGs etc. 


CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING ASSETS AVAILABLE AS SMALLER PACKS:

Futuristic Techno and Trance

Electronic J-Pop

House and EDM vol. 1

Lo-Fi and Trap

Drum and Bass Action Music


plus many more tracks all in these dynamic and modern styles!


QUALITY GUARANTEE:

  • Professional Audio Quality: 
  • loopable (no hiccups or awkward pauses when looping in an engine)
  • balanced volume (no random changes in song volume to distract players)
  • mixed (clear drum patterns, clear melodies, and catered to work against SFX, dialogue, and other gameplay elements)
  •  mastered (play the audio on computer speakers, phone, headphones, or TV, it will always sound clear!)
